scenario_text.value:
We’re all right, thanks. But I guess you saw
some pretty embarrassing stuff just now.

You know what? It’s weird, but I don’t
remember seeing anything at all.

Hee hee! That’s okay, you don’t have to hide
it.

We’re friends, right? We can trust each
other.

Yeah! We’re friends! We could never think
less of you!
